S. Valaee
dcterms:description: The UT-HAR dataset comprises continuous Channel State Information (CSI) data collected using Intel 5300 NIC, segmented into approximately 5000 samples, each containing 250 frames of CSI matrices. It includes 7 distinct categories for human activity recognition: lie down, fall, walk, run, sit down, stand up, and empty room.
dcterms:title: UT-HAR dataset
